member.summary: Interface for creating MessageLog classes.

member.summary: Required designer variable.

member.name: M:PFMessageLogs.MessageLogForm.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:PFMessageLogs.MessageLogForm.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

member.name: P:PFMessageLogs.MessageLogForm.AllowFileErase
member.summary: Allows caller of the form to specify whether or not the File\Erase menu option is visible.

member.name: T:PFMessageLogs.MessageLog
member.summary: Classes containing the routines for updating the MessageLogForm.

member.name: M:PFMessageLogs.MessageLog.#ctor
member.summary: Contructor. Initializes various class variables.

member.name: M:PFMessageLogs.MessageLog.Clear
member.summary: Erases currently displayed text in the MessageLogForm.

member.name: M:PFMessageLogs.MessageLog.CloseWindow
member.summary: Closes the MessageLogForm.

member.name: M:PFMessageLogs.MessageLog.Focus
member.summary: Shifts focus to MessageLogForm.

member.name: M:PFMessageLogs.MessageLog.HideWindow
member.summary: Hides MessageLogForm windows.

member.name: M:PFMessageLogs.MessageLog.LoadFile(System.String)
member.summary: Loads contents of specified file to the MessageLogForm display.

member.name: M:PFMessageLogs.MessageLog.SaveFile(System.String)
member.summary: Saves contents of the MessageLogForm display to a file.

member.name: M:PFMessageLogs.MessageLog.ShowWindow
member.summary: Makes the MessageLogForm visible.

member.name: M:PFMessageLogs.MessageLog.WriteLine(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a line of text to the MessageLogForm display.

member.name: P:PFMessageLogs.MessageLog.AllowFileErase
member.summary: If true the File/Erase menu item will be displayed on the MessageLogForm.

member.name: P:PFMessageLogs.MessageLog.Caption
member.summary: Sets MessageLogForm caption at top of form.

member.name: P:PFMessageLogs.MessageLog.Form
member.summary: Retrieves reference to the MessageLogForm. This allows caller to directly control the form.

member.name: P:PFMessageLogs.MessageLog.FormIsVisible
member.summary: Returns whether or not the MessageLogForm is currently visible.

member.name: P:PFMessageLogs.MessageLog.RetainFocus
member.summary: Forces focus to remain on MessageLogForm after a line of text is written.

member.name: P:PFMessageLogs.MessageLog.ShowDatetime
member.summary: Specifies whether or not to show the date and time with each message displayed on MessageLogForm.

member.name: P:PFMessageLogs.MessageLog.Font
member.summary: Specifies the name of the font to use for the displayed messages.

member.name: P:PFMessageLogs.MessageLog.FontSize
member.summary: Specifies the font size to use for displayed messages.

member.name: T:PFMessageLogs.TextLogFile
member.summary: Class for routines to write messages to a text log file.

member.name: M:PFMessageLogs.TextLogFile.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor.

member.name: M:PFMessageLogs.TextLogFile.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: Name of file messages will be stored in.

member.name: M:PFMessageLogs.TextLogFile.WriteLine(System.String)
member.summary: Writes message line to text log file. This is considered to be an Information message.

member.name: M:PFMessageLogs.TextLogFile.WriteLine(System.String,PFMessageLogs.TextLogFile.LogMessageType)
member.summary: Writes message line to text log file. Type of message is also specified.

member.name: M:PFMessageLogs.TextLogFile.WriteBlankLine
member.summary: Writes empty string to text log file.

member.name: P:PFMessageLogs.TextLogFile.ApplicationName
member.summary: Name of application writing to the log. This will be shown as part of each message. Leave blank to not include application name in the message output.

member.name: P:PFMessageLogs.TextLogFile.DateTimeFormat
member.summary: .NET format string to use for display of date/time values.

member.name: P:PFMessageLogs.TextLogFile.FileName
member.summary: Full path to log file.

member.name: P:PFMessageLogs.TextLogFile.MachineName
member.summary: Name of PC on which log writes taking place. This name will be shown as part of each message. Leave blank to not include machine name in the message output.

member.name: P:PFMessageLogs.TextLogFile.ShowDatetime
member.summary: Specifies whether or not to show date/time with each message.

member.name: P:PFMessageLogs.TextLogFile.ShowMessageType
member.summary: Specifies whether or not to include the message type with the message. When true, all message types are identified as part of the message output.

member.name: P:PFMessageLogs.TextLogFile.ShowErrorWarningTypes
member.summary: Specifies whether or not to include Error and Warning message types with the message. When true, only the Error and Warning message type identifications are included as part of the message output.
